SELECT DISTINCT B.BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(BOARD_CONTENT), 1, 50) AS BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REPLACE(SUBSTR(BOARD_DATE,1,8), '/', '.')) AS BOARD_DATE, B.USERS_ID, COUNT(HEART_ID) OVER(PARTITION BY B.BOARD_ID) AS HEART_SUM FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN ATTACH A ON B.BOARD_ID = A.BOARD_ID LEFT JOIN HEART H ON B.BOARD_ID = H.HEART_ID ORDER BY HEART_SUM
FETCH FIRST #{top} ROW ONLY

SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(BOARD_CONTENT), 1, 50) AS BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REPLACE(SUBSTR(BOARD_DATE,1,8), '/', '.')) AS BOARD_DATE, USERS_ID, BOARD_CATEGORY FROM BOARD WHERE USERS_ID = #{usersId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, USERS_ID, BOARD_CATEGORY) VALUES ( #{boardId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{usersId}, #{boardCategory})
